Address.value: 5097 SOUTH,900 EAST SUITE 100, SALT LAKE CITY, Utah, 84117, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kindly MD, Inc. is a Utah company formed in 2019. KindlyMD is a healthcare data company, focused on holistic pain management and reducing the impact of the opioid epidemic. KindlyMD offers direct health care to patients integrating prescription medicine and behavioral health services to reduce opioid use in the chronic pain patient population.
